testcase.classname: To validate login functionality of facebook
testcase.name: validate with invalid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given user should launch the chrome browser.................................passed When user should type the url...............................................passed And user should maximise the window.........................................passed And user should type the invalid username and invalid password..............passed And user should click the login button......................................passed And user should get the title of the incorrect credential page..............passed
